mapper.update: update t_car set car_num = #{carNum}, brand = #{brand}, guide_price = #{guidePrice}, product_time = #{productTime}, car_type = #{carType} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, car_num carNum, brand, guide_price guidePrice, product_time productTime, car_type carType from t_car where id = #{id}
select id, car_num carNum, brand, guide_price guidePrice, product_time productTime, car_type carType from t_car
